details.title: Design of frequency-coded waveforms for target detection

authors.affiliation: Department of ECE, MGIT, Gandipet, Hyderabad, India
authors.name: T.D. Bhatt

authors.affiliation: Pentagram Research Centre (P) Ltd., 201, Venkat Homes, MIGH-59, Mehdipatnam, Hyderabad, India
authors.name: E.G. Rajan

authors.affiliation: Academic Staff College, JNT University, Hyderabad, India
authors.name: P.V.D. Somasekhar Rao

details.abstract: The authors propose a novel approach to the design of frequency-coded waveforms using modified pushing sequences. The resulting waveforms show that there is considerable enhancement in delay-Doppler resolution in the ambiguity function.

ieee.title: Frequency-coded pulse radar imaging via compressive sensing
ieee.displayText: Yapeng He, Shanna Zhuang, Hongtao Li, Xiaohua Zhu, "Frequency-coded pulse radar imaging via compressive sensing", Radar (Radar) 2011 IEEE CIE International Conference on, vol. 2, pp. 1526-1530, 2011.

ieee.title: The Range-Doppler Chaotic Behavior of the Chaos-Based FM signal
ieee.displayText: Chao Shao, LiJun Han, YiTong Zhang, "The Range-Doppler Chaotic Behavior of the Chaos-Based FM signal", Information Science and Engineering (ICISE) 2009 1st International Conference on, pp. 696-698, 2009.

ieee.title: Improving Ambiguity Function of Costas signal
ieee.displayText: Khaola Kasas, Hassan Aboulnour, Osama Kawas, "Improving Ambiguity Function of Costas signal", Microwave Symposium (MMS) 2009 Mediterrannean, pp. 1-5, 2009.

ieee.title: The Chaotic Behavior of the Chaos-Based Phase-Coded Pulse Train Signal
ieee.displayText: Shao Chao, Lu Peng-Fei, Ma Jian, Guan Yin-Ying, "The Chaotic Behavior of the Chaos-Based Phase-Coded Pulse Train Signal", Signal Acquisition and Processing 2010. ICSAP '10. International Conference on, pp. 263-267, 2010.

ieee.title: Delay and Doppler resolutions analysis of radar phase-coded pulse and frequency-coded pulse
ieee.displayText: Wenzhen Yue, Yan Zhang, Jingwen Xie, "Delay and Doppler resolutions analysis of radar phase-coded pulse and frequency-coded pulse", Electronics Information and Emergency Communication (ICEIEC) 2016 6th International Conference on, pp. 143-148, 2016, ISSN 2377-844X.

patentCitations.patentAbstract: A method for transmission and detection in an adaptive-on-transmit (AT) system operating in the electromagnetic spectrum comprising determining a waveform-filter pair; and employing the waveform-filter pair in transmission and detection, wherein two or more are provided of the group consisting of an auto-correlation function sidelobe level reduction proportional to a the filter length, K, or better, an out-of-band spectral suppression of at least about 40 dB, and a frequency spectrum power tail power decay of K-4 or better.
patentCitations.title: Extended optimal filters for adaptive radar systems using binary codes

citations.title: Design of frequency-coded waveforms for target detection
